segment.source: By turning Live Plus on, you are consenting to the collection of television viewing information by LG Electronics Inc. ("LGE") through ACR module, which may be shared on an anonymized basis to third parties to provide you with interactive services. We may also share aggregated anonymized information to third parties for marketing purposes. Please note that we do not knowingly collect or distribute the above information from or about children under 13. Detailed information about Live Plus is illustrated in Viewing Information (terms) which may be accessed in the SmartTV settings menu. LGE highly recommend that you review the full version of Viewing Information (terms) before you activate Live Plus function.
segment.target: 打开 Live Plus 即表示您同意 LG 电子有限公司（“LGE”）通过 ACR 模块收集您观看电视的信息，这些信息可能会以匿名的方式分享给第三方，以便为您提供互动式服务。我们也可能将汇总的匿名信息分享给第三方，以用于营销目的。请注意，我们不会故意收集或散布来自或关于未满 13 岁儿童的上述信息。有关 Live Plus 的信息会在“观看信息”（条款）中详加描述，您可以在智能电视设置菜单中访问此条款。LGE 强烈建议您在激活 Live Plus 功能前查看完整版本的“观看信息”（条款）。

notes.note: This is a popup mody message after language change

segment.source: The Settings application must reload to change the menu language. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 必须重新加载“设置”应用以更改菜单语言。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a popup mody message after language change

segment.source: Please wait while the Settings application reloads.
segment.target: 请等待“设置”应用重新加载。

notes.note: This is a popup body message after the service country changed

segment.source: Changing the country will cause your TV to restart and you may need to consent to LG's User Agreements again. Also, the availability of some apps and services may vary based on the LG Services Country. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 更改国家/地区将导致您的电视重启，且可能需要再次同意 LG 用户协议。另外，一些应用和服务的可用性可能因 LG 服务国家/地区而异。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a popup body message after the service country changed when not connected network

segment.source: Your TV needs to be connected to the network to automatically set your LG Services Country. Do you want to go to Network Settings now to check the connection?
segment.target: 您的电视需要连接至网络以自动设置您的 LG 服务国家/地区。是否要立即转到“网络设置”检查连接？

notes.note: This is a popup body message after the broadcast country changed

segment.source: After changing the country, all currently tuned channels will be deleted. To re-tune channels, please go to Auto Tuning. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 更改国家/地区后，所有当前搜索的频道将被删除。要重搜频道，请转到“自动搜台”。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a popup body message after the region changed

segment.source: Changing region may change currently tuned channels in your TV. You can re-tune channels in Auto Tuning. Do you want to change regional settings now?
segment.target: 更改地区可能会改变当前电视上搜索的频道。您可以在“自动搜台”中重搜频道。是否要立即更改区域设置？

notes.note: This is a popup body message after set zip code when not connected network

segment.source: Your TV needs to be connected to the network to set your zip code. Do you want to go to Network Settings now to check the connection?
segment.target: 您的电视需要连接至网络才可设置您的邮政编码。是否要立即转到“网络设置”检查连接？

notes.note: This is a popup body message after set zip code when server's status is abnormal

segment.source: You need to be connected to the network to set your zip code. Please try again later.
segment.target: 您需要连接至网络才可设置邮政编码。请稍后重试。

notes.note: This is a popup body message after set zip code when set freeSat in england

segment.source: After changing your Zip Code, all current Freesat channels will be deleted. To re-tune channels, please go to Auto Tuning. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 更改您的邮政编码后，所有当前 Freesat 频道将被删除。要重搜频道，请转到“自动搜台”。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a popup body message

segment.source: Unable to connect to device. Please make sure your device is turned on, and set to the pairing mode and try again.
segment.target: 无法连接设备。请确认您的设备已打开并设置为配对模式，然后重试。

notes.note: This is a popup body message

segment.source: Currently connected LG Wireless Keyboard device will be disconnected from your TV. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 当前已连接的 LG 无线键盘设备将会从您的电视断开。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a popup body message in case of user turn off the screen saver function.

segment.source: If you turn the screen saver off and the same image remains on the screen for more than 2 hours, it can affect the picture quality of your screen. If it remains for more than 5 hours, permanent picture quality depreciation may occur. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 如果您关闭屏幕保护且同一图像在屏幕上显示超过 2 小时，则会影响屏幕的图像质量。如果超过 5 小时，可能出现永久性图片质量降低。是否要继续？

notes.note: Here 'Store' : means retail shop, not saving something

segment.source: Store Mode is for in-store display purposes. It will re-initialize settings every few minutes. Do you want to set to Store Mode?
segment.target: “商店模式”主要用于店内展示。每隔几分钟将进行初始化设置。是否设为“商店模式”？

notes.note: This is a menu name about TV turn on via Wi-Fi devices.
This is a menu name about delete paring devices.
This is a help text about Mobile TV on function.

segment.source: Enable other devices and apps to turn on your TV.
segment.target: 启用其他设备和应用以打开您的电视。

notes.note: This is a help text about Turn on TV via Wi-Fi function.

segment.source: Turn your TV on using your mobile phone via network.
segment.target: 通过网络使用您的手机打开电视。

segment.source: Turn your TV on using your mobile phone via Bluetooth.
segment.target: 通过 Bluetooth 使用您的手机打开电视。

segment.source: Your TV needs to know your correct location to provide emergency alert messages through its digital TV signal.
segment.target: 电视需要您的正确位置以通过数字电视信号提供紧急警报信息。

segment.source: Software update has been installed. Update will be applied when you restart your TV.
segment.target: 软件更新已安装。重启电视时，将应用更新。

segment.source: Update will be cancelled and all update files will be deleted now. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 更新将被取消且所有更新文件将立即被删除。是否要继续？

segment.source: The update cannot be applied to the TV. Software will revert to the previous version.
segment.target: 更新无法应用到电视。软件将恢复为之前的版本。

segment.source: Unable to connect to the network.
Turning Wi-Fi off will prevent you from accessing all Internet-based services unless you use a cable to connect to the network. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 除非您使用网线连接至网络，否则关闭 Wi-Fi 会让您无法访问所有基于互联网的服务。是否要继续？

segment.source: Press the WPS button on a WPS-enabled router to connect the TV to the network.
segment.target: 请在已启用 WPS 功能的路由器上按 WPS 按钮以将电视连接到网络。

segment.source: Currently connecting via Wi-Fi Direct. Please accept the request on your [{devicename}].
segment.target: 当前通过 Wi-Fi 直连进行连接。请接受您 [{devicename}] 上的请求。

segment.source: Wi-Fi Direct connection has not succeeded.
To use the Wi-Fi Direct, you must close the Screen Share app.
segment.target: 要使用 Wi-Fi 直连，必须关闭“多屏互动”应用。

segment.source: To use Wi-Fi Direct, you must turn on the Wi-Fi within the TV. Do you want to turn Wi-Fi on?
segment.target: 要使用 Wi-Fi 直连，电视必须开启 Wi-Fi。是否要打开 Wi-Fi？

segment.source: The list of all paired devices will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 所有已配对设备的列表将被删除。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a message about these values of picture mode to other picture mode. PLEASE KEEP replacement parameter format.

segment.source: Current values of customized picture mode settings will be applied to {pictureMode} mode for all inputs. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 自定义画面模式设置的当前数值将应用于所有输入的 {pictureMode} 模式。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is a description about reset values of this picture mode. PLEASE KEEP replacement parameter format.

segment.source: All current settings for {pictureMode} mode will be reset. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 所有 {pictureMode} 模式的当前设置将被重置。是否要继续？

notes.note: This is menu name when HDR movie is playing.
This is an one of message about HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color function.

segment.source: You can only change settings from the current HDMI input.
segment.target: 您可以仅从当前 HDMI 输入中更改设置。

notes.note: This is a popup body message in case of user changed the value.

segment.source: Picture or sound may not work properly while connected external device and TV are initially communicating. If the issue persists, please revert the settings or reboot your connected external device.
segment.target: 在已连接的外部设备和电视进行初始通信期间，图片或声音可能无法正常工作。如果问题持续存在，请恢复设置或重启已连接的外部设备。

notes.note: This is an one of message about HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color function.

segment.source: Note: if your device does not support this feature, it may not work properly. In that case, you can connect the device to a different HDMI port or turn the HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Color setting off.
segment.target: 注意：如果您的设备不支持此功能，这可能无法正常工作。此时，您可以将设备连接至另一个 HDMI 端口或关闭“ULTRA HD Deep Color”设置。

segment.source: Channels from HDMI and other external inputs cannot be locked. To lock TV channels, change the current input to Live TV.
segment.target: 无法锁定来自 HDMI 和其他外部输入的频道。要锁定电视频道，请将当前输入更改为直播电视。

segment.source: Please enter your Safety password to confirm you want to turn off this function.
segment.target: 请输入您的安全密码并确认您想要关闭此功能。

segment.source: Lock changes for currently running apps will be applied the next time they are started.
segment.target: 对当前运行的应用进行的锁定更改将在下次开始时应用。

segment.source: Unable to connect to the Bluetooth audio device. Sound Out setting will be changed to Internal TV Speaker. If you want to connect to another Bluetooth device, select the DEVICE SELECTION button.
segment.target: 无法连接至 Bluetooth 音频设备。“音频输出”设置将更改为“电视内置扬声器”。如果想连接至另一个 Bluetooth 设备，请选择“设备选择”按钮。

notes.note: popup text - {Device} :Devive Name. PLEASE KEEP replacement parameter format.

segment.target: 将从配对设备列表中移除 [{Device}]。如果您想稍后连接，则需要搜索可用设备并重新配对。是否要继续？

notes.note: popup text - {Device} :Devive Name. PLEASE KEEP replacement parameter format.

segment.target: [{Device}] 将与您的电视中断开连接。声音将无法通过此设备播放。是否要继续？

notes.note: popup text - {Device} :Devive Name. PLEASE KEEP replacement parameter format.

segment.source: You can turn your TV on using your mobile phone.
segment.target: 您可以使用手机打开电视。

segment.source: If set to on, your TV can receive emergency alerts if an emergency situation occurs.
segment.target: 如果设置为开启，则在紧急情况发生时电视可以接收紧急警报。

[webOS 3.5] This is a help string about aspect ratio settings.

segment.source: Select aspect ratio from the menu.
segment.target: 从菜单中选择画面比率。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a help string about just scan function.

segment.source: If you turn this feature on, you can view the content in the aspect ratio that is in the broadcast signal or content source. If the edge of the screen is not clean, please turn it off.
segment.target: 如果您开启此功能，则可以播放广播信号或内容来源的画面比率来查看内容。如果屏幕边缘不清晰，请将其关闭。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a one of picture mode name
[webOS 3.5] This is a one of picture mode name

[webOS 3.5] This is a one of menu name. This function will help to better about panel noise.
[webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: Pixel Refresher allows your TV to provide the clearest picture possible.
segment.target: 借助像素刷新器，电视可以提供最清晰的画面。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: The process will take about an hour to complete and your TV needs to remain turned off.
segment.target: 此过程大约需要一小时完成，电视需要保持关闭。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: Pixel Refresher has been scheduled to start the next time your TV is turned off.
segment.target: 预约在下次电视关闭时启动像素刷新器。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: Pixel Refresher will begin when you turn off your TV.
segment.target: 关闭电视时将开始运行像素刷新器。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: If recording or software update is in progress, it will wait until they are completed and the process can take more than an hour.
segment.target: 如果正在进行录制或软件更新，则将等待直至完成。此过程可能需要一小时以上。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a popup text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: Your TV must stay off while Pixel Refresher process is in progress. Any current or upcoming recordings, reminders, or timer power-on scheduled during this process will be canceled.
segment.target: 在像素刷新器运行过程中，电视必须保持关闭。在此过程中将取消任何当前或即将到来的录制、提醒或预约的定时开机。

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a popup text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source: Do you want to turn your TV off now?

notes.note: [webOS 3.5] This is a body text about pixel refresher function.

segment.source:
Note:
1. If your TV is turned on while Pixel Refresher is in progress, it will stop the process and you have to start over.
2. While processing, a white line may appear in the screen. This is normal when clearing your screen.
segment.target:
注意：
1. 如果在像素刷新器正在运行时打开电视，则此过程将停止，您必须重新开始。
2. 在处理过程中，屏幕上可能会出现一条白线，这在屏幕优化时属于正常现象。

segment.source: Screen will turn off in 5 seconds. To turn the screen back on, press any button except the power and volume button.
segment.target: 屏幕将在 5 秒后关闭。要重新打开屏幕，请按除电源和音量按钮外的任意按钮。

segment.source: Turn your TV on using your mobile phone via Wi-Fi.
segment.target: 通过 Wi-Fi 使用您的手机打开电视。

segment.source: Keep Dolby Atmos on for the best sound experience for Dolby Atmos content. You can also turn Smart Sound Mode on to enhance all other audio content using Dolby processing.
segment.target: 开启杜比全景声，体验杜比全景声内容的最佳音效。您也可以开启智能声音模式，使用杜比处理技术提高所有其他音频内容的音效。

segment.source: Turn Dolby Surround on to make all your content sound better. Note that Dolby Atmos must also be switched on to use this feature.
segment.target: 开启杜比环绕声，使所有内容呈现更好的音效。请注意，要使用此功能，必须同时打开杜比全景声。

segment.source: To experience optimal sound effect, it is recommended to set the balance between the L10~R10 range.
segment.target: 为了体验最优音效，建议将平衡设置在左10 ~ 右10 范围之间。

segment.source: Recommend channels or content based on your viewing information through Network.
segment.target: 根据您通过网络查看的信息为您推荐频道或内容。

segment.source: Turning this option off will provide recommendation based on popularity.
segment.target: 如果关闭此选项，系统将根据流行性为您进行推荐。

segment.source: If you turn this feature on, you can view more information about the TV program you are watching and related content.
segment.target: 如果打开此功能，则可以查看有关正在收看的电视节目和相关内容的更多信息。

segment.source: If you have problems while using your TV, check or adjust the settings to resolve the problems.
segment.target: 如果您在使用电视时遇到问题，请检查或调整设置来解决问题。

segment.source: By turning Live Plus on, you confirm that you understand that the content displayed on your TV can be recognized and the viewing information may be collected, processed and shared with third parties to provide you with an enhanced viewing experience and personalized services. Please review the Privacy Policy and relevant user agreements in the TV settings menu before you activate Live Plus function.
segment.target: 打开 Live Plus 即表示您确认可以识别您电视上显示的内容，并可以收集、处理和与第三方共享观看信息，以便为您提供增强的观看体验和个性化的服务。在激活 Live Plus 功能之前，请查看电视设置菜单中的隐私政策和相关用户协议。

segment.source: Even when the TV is off, you can listen to music or use the voice recognition function by connecting the smartphone while using the minimum power.
segment.target: 即使在电视关闭时，您也可以通过连接智能手机听音乐或使用语音识别功能，同时使用最小功率。

segment.source: You'll be welcomed when you come home based on the data on your registered smartphone and ambient lighting will be provided when motion is detected around the TV.
segment.target: 基于您注册的智能手机上的数据，您会在回家后受到欢迎，并且当在电视周围检测到动作时，将提供环境照明。

segment.source: Select the contents to show while the screen is coming up when the TV is turned on.
segment.target: 选择打开电视时，屏幕出现时要显示的内容。

segment.source: To keep your TV in the optimal condition, Always-on will be disabled for the set four hours and the power will be completely turned off.
segment.target: 为使您的电视保持最佳状态，请将 Always-on 功能禁用设定的四小时，并且电源将完全关闭。

segment.source: During the Always-on Off Time, available features may be limited when the screen is turned off.
segment.target: 在 Always-on 关闭时间内，屏幕关闭时可用功能会受到限制。

segment.source: Select the hours you don't usually watch TV.
segment.target: 选择您通常不看电视的时间。

segment.source: If you turn “Receive Event Notifications” off, all notifications you have received from the LG TV Plus app on your smartphone will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 如果您关闭“接收事件通知”，则您从智能手机上的 LG TV Plus 应用收到的所有通知都将被删除。是否要继续？

segment.source: Even when the TV is off, you can listen to music by connecting your smartphone with the TV via Bluetooth.
segment.target: 即使在电视关闭时，您也可以通过 Bluetooth 连接智能手机与电视来听音乐。

segment.source: Use the voice recognition with “Hi LG”
segment.target: 通过说出“Hi LG”使用语音识别功能

segment.source: If you speak "Hi LG" without pressing the voice button on the remote control, you can use the voice recognition function.
segment.target: 如果您在不按遥控器上的语音按钮的情况下说出“Hi LG”，则可以使用语音识别功能。

segment.source: Enable your TV to recognize your speech by learning the type of your speech including pronunciation and intonation.
segment.target: 通过学习语音类型（包括发音和语调），使您的电视能够识别您的语音。

notes.note: Voice help, {n} should be changed in run time

segment.target: 学习了 {n} 个语音模型。

segment.source: Your TV can learn a total of 10 voice models, and when the number of the learned voice models exceeds 10, the first learned voice model will be deleted.
segment.target: 您的电视可以学习总共 10 个语音模型，当学习的语音模型的数量超过 10 个时，将删除第一个学习的语音模型。

segment.source: When the TV is off, the voice recognition function is activated in the state of Always-on.
segment.target: 电视关闭时，语音识别功能在 Always-on 状态下激活。

segment.source: Receive notifications on your TV at the date and time you have specified in the LG TV Plus app on your smartphone.
segment.target: 在您在智能手机上的 LG TV Plus 应用中指定的日期和时间接收电视上的通知。

segment.source: The screen will slide down in 5 seconds. Press any button except Power and Volume on the remote to slide the screen back up.
segment.target: 屏幕将在 5 秒后向下滑动。按遥控器上除电源和音量以外的任何按钮可以向上滑动屏幕。

segment.source: You can reset the connection history of devices that are connected via Screen Share (Miracast).
segment.target: 您可以重置通过多屏互动 (Miracast) 连接的设备的连接历史记录。

segment.source: You can control the devices that are connected to HDMI ports with Magic Remote without device setup processes.
segment.target: 您可以使用动感应遥控器控制连接到 HDMI 端口的设备，无需设置设备过程。

segment.source: Link To Devices for Voice Control
segment.target: 关联设备以便实现语音控制

segment.source: If you set the Menu Language as English in the same way as with Voice Recognition Language, voice recognition will be available more conveniently.
segment.target: 如果与语音搜索语言一样，也将菜单语言设定成英语，则语音识别更方便使用。

segment.source: The available external voice recognition services may change depending on the language setting. Also, if you change the menu language, the setting menu is reloaded. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: 可用的外部语音识别服务可能会根据语言设置而有所改变。此外，如果更改菜单语言，则会重新加载设置菜单。是否要继续？

segment.source: The information about software updates, TV devices, user guide, and the terms and conditions is provided.
segment.target: 提供有关软件更新、电视设备、用户指南以及条款和条件的信息。

segment.source: You may confirm the terms and conditions or change whether to accept the terms and conditions.
segment.target: 您可以确认条款和条件，或对是否接受条款和条件进行更改。

segment.source: You can set the additional functions related to the TV.
segment.target: 您可以设置与电视有关的其他功能。

segment.target: 您可以检查电视状态或更改设置。

segment.source: You can set the sound to play when the TV is turned on or off.
segment.target: 您可以设置在打开或关闭电视时播放的声音。

segment.target: 请注意，当“数字声音输出”被设置为“通过”时，可能无法输出声音。

segment.target: 您可以根据您观看活动的历史记录设置是否接收内容推荐。

segment.source: You may receive messages recommending content based on the history of watching content or using apps.

segment.source: While the changed set value is transferred to an external device, the picture or sound may not be normally provided temporarily.
segment.target: 当更改后的设定值被传输到外部设备时，可能暂时无法正常提供画面或声音。

segment.source: If the same symptom repeats, please change the set value again or restart the connected external device.
segment.target: 如果重复出现相同的症状，请再次更改设定值或重启连接的外部设备。

segment.source: If you turn on the function, you can enjoy Dolby Atmos content with the optimal sound.
segment.target: 如果您打开此功能，则可以享受音质最佳的杜比全景声内容。

segment.source: The optimized sound is automatically enabled in real time depending on content types.
segment.target: 根据内容类型，实时地自动启用优化的声音。

segment.source: The optimized sound and immersive surround effects are provided for content types based on artificial intelligence.
segment.target: 基于人工智能针对内容类型提供优化的声音和沉浸式环绕效果。

segment.source: You can select the best sound mode for each content type and customize detailed audio effects of the standard sound mode.
segment.target: 您可以为每种内容类型选择最佳声音模式，并自定义标准声音模式的详细音频效果。

notes.note: One Touch Sound Tuning's help string.

segment.source: You can use Magic Remote to determine the room’s acoustics and optimize your TV’s sound based on the results.
segment.target: 您可以根据结果使用动感应遥控器确定房间里的音响效果并优化电视的声音。

segment.source: You can set additional sound settings.
segment.target: 您可以设置其他声音设置。

segment.source: Enjoy an immersive 3D soundscape like that of Dolby Atmos with a virtual surround sound effect applied to the general content.
segment.target: 享受如杜比全景声一般的沉浸式 3D 音景，其将虚拟环绕音效应用于一般内容。

segment.source: Enjoy an immersive 3D soundscape with the virtual multi-channel surround sound effect with reinforced upward sound field effects.
segment.target: 通过上升的声场效果得到增强的虚拟多通道环绕音效享受沉浸式 3D 音景。

segment.source: You can change the sound to meet your taste for each sound frequency band.
segment.target: 您可以通过更改声音来满足自己对每个声音频带的要求。

segment.source: You can turn the automatic volume adjustment function on/off and select the range of each adjustment with the remote control.
segment.target: 您可以打开/关闭自动音量调节功能，并使用遥控器选择每个调节范围。

segment.source: If the device is not connected, you may not hear any sound through it.
segment.target: 如果设备未连接，您可能无法通过设备听到任何声音。

segment.source: Enjoy sound with the LG Sound Sync or a wireless audio device connected via Bluetooth.
segment.target: 借助LG 声音同步或通过 Bluetooth 连接的无线音频设备享受声音。

segment.source: It may not work depending on connected devices.
segment.target: 取决于连接的设备，此功能可能无法使用。

segment.source: You can enjoy the sound via external audio devices connected to the Audio Out/Headphones output ports.
segment.target: 您可以通过连接到 Audio Out/Headphones 输出端口的外部音频设备享受声音。

segment.source: You can enjoy the sound by connecting Wired Headphones.
segment.target: 您可以连接有线耳机享受声音。

notes.note: Internal TV Speaker + Optical's help string.

segment.source: You can enjoy the sound via both the Internal TV Speaker and external audio devices connected to the OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT port.
segment.target: 您可以通过内置电视扬声器以及与光纤数字音频输出端口连接的外部音频设备享受声音。

notes.note: Internal TV Speaker + Wired Headphones's help string.

segment.source: You can enjoy the sound via both the Internal TV Speaker and Wired Headphones.
segment.target: 您可以通过内置电视扬声器和有线耳机享受声音。

segment.source: One Touch Sound Tuning is disabled.
segment.target: 一键式声音调谐II已禁用。

segment.source: Reinforce the low-pitched tone of the corrected sound.
segment.target: 加强校正后的声音的低音调。

segment.source: Reinforce a high-pitched tone of the corrected sound.
segment.target: 加强校正后的声音的高音调。

segment.source: Adjust the audio timing to synchronize the video and audio.
segment.target: 调整音频时间以同步视频和音频。

segment.source: Select an audio format (Bitstream/PCM) for each HDMI input.
segment.target: 为每个 HDMI 输入选择音频格式 (Bitstream/PCM)。

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Select this when your TV is a stand type and is about 30cm or more away from the wall.
segment.target: 当您的电视是支架型并且距离墙壁约 30 厘米或更远时选择此项。

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.target: 通过减少从墙壁反射的低音调，享受更清晰的声音。

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Select this when your TV is a wall-mounted type.
segment.target: 当您的电视是壁挂型时选择此项。

segment.source: The gap between the sound volumes of the channel and program is automatically reduced, which helps you watch the program with a consistent volume.
segment.target: 频道和节目的音量之间的差距会自动缩小，这有助于您以一致的音量观看节目。

segment.source: HDMI {port1} port support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} 端口支持即时游戏响应。您可以打开或关闭端口的即时游戏响应。如果连接到端口的设备也支持即时游戏响应，则可以观看游戏的最佳画面。

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2} and HDMI {port3} ports support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}、HDMI {port2} 和 HDMI {port3} 端口支持即时游戏响应。您可以打开或关闭端口的即时游戏响应。如果连接到端口的设备也支持即时游戏响应，则可以观看游戏的最佳画面。

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3} and HDMI {port4} ports support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}、HDMI {port2}、HDMI {port3} 和 HDMI {port4} 端口支持即时游戏响应。您可以打开或关闭端口的即时游戏响应。如果连接到端口的设备也支持即时游戏响应，则可以观看游戏的最佳画面。

segment.source: You can set and edit the IP address version to IPv4 or IPv6.
segment.target: 您可以设置 IP 地址版本并将其编辑为 IPv4 或 IPv6。

segment.target: 但是，IPv6 版本的地址不支持编辑。

segment.target: 借助设备连接，您可以在电视上连接和设置各类设备。

segment.target: 您可以查看连接到 HDMI 端口的设备信息并调整相关设置。

HDMI Input Audio Format's help string

segment.source: Please set Dolby Atmos EDID, and select an audio format(Bitstream/PCM) for each HDMI input.
segment.target: 请设置“杜比全景声 EDID”，然后为每个 HDMI 输入选择音频格式 (Bitstream/PCM)。

segment.source: If you turn on the function, the optimized sound is provided for an audio device supporting Dolby Atmos.
segment.target: 如果您打开此功能，则将为支持杜比全景声的音频设备提供优化的声音。

segment.source: For better TV experience, recommendation of features, apps or contents will be provided based on prior usage.
segment.target: 为了提供更好的电视体验，将基于之前的使用情况提供功能、应用或内容的推荐。

segment.source: By agreeing to relevant terms, you can receive advanced recommendations.
segment.target: 通过同意相关条款，您可以接收高级推荐。

segment.source: Please refer to the User Agreements on the Setting menu for further information.
segment.target: 有关更多信息，请参阅设置菜单上的用户协议。

segment.source: Enjoy a high-quality sound by wirelessly connecting your TV with WiSA Speakers.
segment.target: 通过将电视无线连接到 WiSA 扬声器来聆听高品质声音。

segment.source: This mode provides a clear and natural sound.
segment.target: 此模式提供了清晰自然的音质。

segment.source: However, to keep your TV in the optimal condition, Always-on will be disabled for the set five hours, and the power will be completely turned off.
segment.target: 但是，为使您的电视保持最佳状态，请将 Always-on 功能禁用设定的五小时，并且电源将完全关闭。

segment.source: You can adjust the sound effects when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: 您可以在电视打开或关闭和屏幕移动时调整音效。

segment.target: 按右按钮以调整 OLED Motion 设置。

segment.source: Adjust peak brightness for the brightest luminance.
segment.target: 调整峰值亮度以获得最大亮度。

segment.source: Register the TV to LG account to control the TV with the voice recognition of external device.
segment.target: 在 LG 账户中注册电视，通过外部设备的语音识别来控制电视。

segment.source: Even when the TV is off and using the minimum power, you can listen to music by connecting the mobile device or use the voice recognition.
segment.target: 即使电视关闭，使用最小功率，您也可以通过连接移动设备或使用语音识别来收听音乐。

segment.source: Your TV must stay off while Pixel Refresher process is in progress. Any current or upcoming recordings, reminders, or timer power-on scheduled during this process will be canceled and the BT speaker on Zero View is not available.
segment.target: 在像素刷新器运行过程中，电视必须保持关闭状态。在此过程中将取消任何当前或即将进行的录制、提醒或预约的定时开机且零视图上的 BT 扬声器不可用。

segment.source: The visual effects is displayed on the screen when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: 当电视打开或关闭并且屏幕移动时，屏幕上会显示视觉效果。

segment.source: When the visual effects is off, the screen is displayed as Live TV.
segment.target: 当视觉效果关闭后，屏幕显示为直播电视。

segment.source: Even when the TV is off and using the minimum power, you can listen to music by connecting the mobile device. A wealth of features can be used fast again when TV is turned on.
segment.target: 即使在电视关闭状态下，使用最小功率，您也可以通过连接移动设备来聆听音乐。打开电视即可再次快速使用丰富功能。

segment.source: Adjust your pointer's moving speed and size.
segment.target: 调整指针的移动速度和大小。

segment.source: To provide an optimized picture quality, the ULTRA HD Deep Color of the current HDMI port will be changed to 8K.
segment.target: 要提供最佳画面质量，将当前 HDMI 端口的“ULTRA HD Deep Color”更改为 8K。

segment.source: While applying the settings, picture or sound may not work properly.
segment.target: 应用设置期间，画面或声音可能无法正常工作。

segment.source: If the issue persists, please revert the settings or reboot your connected external device.
segment.target: 如果问题持续存在，请恢复设置或重启已连接的外部设备。

segment.source: You can select the ULTRA HD Deep Color of Port.
segment.target: 您可以选择端口的“ULTRA HD Deep Color”。

segment.source: You can launch the Instant Game Response by setting HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Color "On".
segment.target: 您可以通过将“HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Color”设置为“打开”来启动即时游戏响应。

segment.source: The process will take about {n} minute(s) to complete and your TV needs to remain turned off.
segment.target: 此过程大约需要 {n} 分钟完成，电视需要保持关闭。

segment.source: If recording or software update is in progress, it will wait until they are completed and the process can take more than {n} minute(s).
segment.target: 如果正在进行录制或软件更新，则将等待直至完成。此过程可能需要 {n} 分钟以上。

segment.source: Select the ULTRA HD Deep Color for HDMI {num} port.
segment.target: 选择 HDMI {num} 端口的“ULTRA HD Deep Color”。

segment.source: Select another Digital Sound Out (Auto or PCM) if you can't hear sound effect after selecting Pass Through.
segment.target: 如果在选择“通过”后无法听到音效，则选择其他“数字声音输出”（自动或 PCM）。

segment.source: The visual effects is displayed on the screen when the TV is turned on and the screen moves.
segment.target: 当电视打开并且屏幕移动时，屏幕上会显示视觉效果。

segment.source: Screen shifts at regular time intervals and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: 在固定时间间隔进行屏幕转移，防止在长时间打开电视后可能遇到的画面质量问题。

segment.source: Adjust the luminance of static images such as logos, etc and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: 调整静态图像（如标志等）的亮度，防止在长时间打开电视后可能遇到的画面质量问题。

segment.source: Guide menus and operations with voice for visually impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: 用语音导航菜单和操作，以便视障用户使用电视。

segment.source: Adjust speed, volume and etc in detail after turning on the function.
segment.target: 打开此功能后，详细调整速度、音量等。

segment.source: Adjust remote's cursor speed and appearance.
segment.target: 调整遥控器的光标速度和外观。

segment.source: Adjust the transparency of some menus such as TV Guide and Search so that the background is visible even when using the menu.
segment.target: 调整某些菜单（如“节目指南”和“搜索”）的透明度，以便在使用菜单时也能看到背景。

segment.source: The menu for transparency adjustment may vary depending on the product model and the current status.
segment.target: 透明度调整菜单可能因产品型号和当前状态而异。

segment.source: Describe the content on the screen with voice for visually impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: 用语音描述屏幕上的内容，以便视障用户使用电视。

segment.source: This function works only when it is provided by the broadcast program.
segment.target: 只有在广播节目提供时方可使用此功能。

segment.source: Set additional options for Video Description.
segment.target: 在“视频描述”中设置其他选项。

segment.source: Display captions for hearing-impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: 显示字幕，以便听力受损用户使用电视。

segment.source: Set the sound to play when the TV is turned on or off.
segment.target: 设置在打开或关闭电视时播放的声音。

segment.source: Enhance the contrast between bright and dark areas of some menus, such as the background and text, for being easily viewed by those with low-vision.
segment.target: 增强某些菜单的明暗区域（如背景和文本）之间的对比度，以便于低视力用户查看。

segment.source: Select a caption type for digital broadcasts and set the caption size, color and etc.
segment.target: 选择数字广播的字幕类型，并设置字幕大小、颜色等。

segment.source: View more information about watching program and enjoy related contents.
segment.target: 查看有关正在观看的节目的更多信息，并享受相关内容。

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] Do Not Track's helpString in HbbTV

segment.source: The HbbTV application or service will disable its tracking of an individual user.
segment.target: HbbTV 应用程序或服务将禁用其对个人用户的跟踪。

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] Do Not Track's helpString in IBB Service

segment.source: The IBB service will disable its tracking of an individual user.
segment.target: IBB 服务将禁用其对个人用户的跟踪。

segment.source: This service provides you with more information about watching program and enjoys related contents.
segment.target: 此项服务为您提供有关正在观看的节目的更多信息，并允许您享受相关内容。

segment.source: Select the audio properties to listen to the broadcast in the way you like.
segment.target: 选择音频属性，以您喜欢的方式收听广播。

segment.source: Provide HbbTV Distinctive ID to HbbTV service for broadcasts.
segment.target: 为广播的 HbbTV 服务提供 HbbTV 独特 ID。

segment.source: Watch a diverse range of Internet contents on TV channels.
segment.target: 在电视频道上观看各种互联网内容。

segment.source: Select audio language for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: 选择数字广播的音频语言。

segment.source: If the program does not support multiple languages, the default language is selected.
segment.target: 如果节目不支持多种语言，将选择默认语言。

segment.source: Consent is required for the collection of television viewing to use the service. Collected information may be provided to LG Electronics Inc. ("LGE") and third party service provider for customized advertising.
segment.target: 若要使用本服务，用户必须同意收集电视观看信息。收集到的信息可能会提供给 LG Electronics Inc.（“LGE”）和第三方服务提供商进行广告定制。

segment.source: Inspect the TV status or change the settings.
segment.target: 检查电视状态或更改设置。

segment.source: * The sound may not output when Digital Sound Out is set to Pass Through.
segment.target: * 当“数字声音输出”被设置为“通过”时，可能无法输出声音。

segment.source: Set contents recommendations-related features based on watching history.
segment.target: 根据观看历史记录设置内容推荐相关功能。

segment.source: The language for the voice recognition will be automatically set depending on the selected menu language.
segment.target: 根据选择的菜单语言，将自动设置语音识别语言。

segment.source: If the selected language does not support, the default language from broadcasts will be used.
segment.target: 如果所选语言不支持，将使用广播的默认语言。

segment.source: Select your first choice of audio language for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: 选择数字广播的首选音频语言。

segment.source: Select your second choice of audio language for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: 选择数字广播的第二选择音频语言。

segment.source: Set the region and country for broadcasts and special services.
segment.target: 设置适用于广播和特殊服务的国家和地区。

segment.source: Select the residential region for your regional broadcast signal.
segment.target: 选择适用于地区广播信号的居住地区。

segment.source: Select the country for your country's special services.
segment.target: 选择适用于您所在国家/地区特殊服务的国家/地区。

segment.source: Provided services may vary depending on countries.
segment.target: 提供的服务可能因国家/地区而异。

segment.source: Set the time for TV to turn on or off automatically.
segment.target: 设置电视自动打开或关闭的时间。

segment.source: Set the TV to turn off automatically after a set amount of time.
segment.target: 设置电视在设定时间段后自动关闭。

segment.source: TV can be used as an alarm.
TV is turned off at a set time on every specified day.
segment.target: 电视在每天设置的时间关闭。

segment.source: Set the TV to turn off automatically if there is no user input for 2 hours after the TV automatically turns on.
segment.target: 电视自动打开后，如果 2 个小时内没有用户输入，电视将自动关闭。

segment.source: Select the channel to watch when the TV turns on.
segment.target: 选择电视打开时要观看的频道。

segment.source: Set the volume level when the TV turns on.
segment.target: 设置电视打开时的音量。

segment.source: Adjust the sound effects when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: 在电视打开或关闭和屏幕移动时调整音效。

segment.source: During the Always-on Off Time, part of features like voice recognition and etc are limited when the screen off.
segment.target: 在 Always-on 关闭时间内，屏幕关闭时部分功能（如语音识别等）会受到限制。

segment.source: Recommend setting up the hours you don't usually watch TV to Always-on.
segment.target: 建议将您通常不看电视的时间设置为 Always-on。

segment.source: You'll be welcomed when you come home based on the registered smartphone information and ambient lighting will be provided when motion is detected around the TV.
segment.target: 基于您注册的智能手机信息，您会在回家后受到欢迎，并且当在电视周围检测到动作时，将提供环境照明。

segment.source: Even when the TV is off, you can listen to music by connecting smartphone to the TV via Bluetooth.
segment.target: 即使在电视关闭时，您也可以通过 Bluetooth 将智能手机连接到电视来听音乐。

segment.source: Set your account and check information to use service from LG.
segment.target: 设置您的账户并检查信息，以使用 LG 提供的服务。

segment.source: Turn on/off the related features of energy consumption.
segment.target: 打开/关闭能耗的相关功能。

segment.source: Set the time to turn off the TV automatically without user input.
segment.target: 设置在没有用户输入的情况下自动关闭电视的时间。

segment.source: When a connected HDD has not been used for a specified amount of time, switch to standby mode to reduce power consumption.
segment.target: 当一段时间内未使用连接的 HDD 时，切换至待机模式以减少能耗。

segment.source: Collect and store MAC address, model number, country code, language settings, and software version to verify the latest software to update.
segment.target: 收集并存储 MAC 地址、型号、国家/地区代码、语言设置和软件版本，以验证要更新的最新软件。

segment.source: Adjust animation effect shown on the home at certain times.
segment.target: 调整指定时间在主页上显示的动画效果。

segment.source: Receive emergency alerts from TV when an emergency occurs.
segment.target: 发生紧急情况时，从电视接收紧急警报。

segment.source: Switch to standby mode to turn the TV back on quickly when you turn off the TV.
segment.target: 关闭电视时，切换到待机模式可以快速打开电视。

segment.source: Switch to standby mode to use a variety of function like apps, search and etc quickly when you turn off the TV.
segment.target: 关闭电视时，切换到待机模式以快速使用各种功能，如应用、搜索等。

segment.source: Energy consumption may increase if this feature is on.
segment.target: 如果启用此功能，能耗可能会增加。

segment.source: Set collecting cookies or delete the record of cookies to control the advertising frequency.
segment.target: 设置收集 Cookie 或删除 Cookie 记录以控制广告曝光频率。

segment.source: Track the number of the advertising frequency shown on TV and set the same ads not to show up continuously above a certain level.
segment.target: 跟踪电视上显示的广告曝光频率数，并将相同广告设置为在某一水平以上不能连续出现。

segment.source: LG Wireless Keyboard allows you to control TV through Bluetooth.
segment.target: LG 无线键盘允许您通过 Bluetooth 控制电视。

segment.source: This feature applies only to specified LG Wireless Keyboard models.
segment.target: 该功能仅适用于指定的 LG 无线键盘型号。

segment.source: If the static screen has not received any user input for an hour, it will switch to a screen saver.
segment.target: 如果静态屏幕在一小时内未收到任何用户输入，将会切换到屏幕保护程序。

segment.source: If you turn this option off, the static screen may remain longer, which degrade screen quality or hardly recover in some cases.
segment.target: 如果关闭此选项，静态屏幕可能会保持更长时间，从而降低屏幕质量或在某些情况下难以恢复。

segment.source: * Though this option is set to ON, the screen saver will not work to avoid disturbing your viewing experience on external inputs like Live TV.
segment.target: * 虽然此选项设置为“开”，但屏幕保护程序将不工作，以避免干扰您的外部输入（如直播电视）观看体验。

segment.source: Select the place where to use the TV.
If you select Store Demo mode, it is set to optimized values for retail displays selling TV.
segment.target: 如果选择“商店演示”模式，则会将其设置为针对卖场展示的优化值。

segment.source: Revert TV to its initial settings.
segment.target: 将电视恢复到初始设置。

segment.source: This will revert all options on TV to their default settings.
segment.target: 这会将电视上的所有选项恢复为默认设置。

segment.source: If the time you set is much different from the current time, some of the smart features may not be displayed.
segment.target: 如果设置的时间与当前时间有很大不同，则某些智能功能可能无法显示。

segment.source: Turn on/off the images to be displayed on screen when there is no signal.
segment.target: 无信号时打开/关闭屏幕上显示的图像。

segment.source: Check descriptions for each LG webOS TV functions.
segment.target: 查看各项 LG webOS TV 功能的描述。

segment.source: Adjust whether to display the home promotion.
segment.target: 调整是否显示家庭促销。

segment.source: Set the specialized functions of SIGNATURE TV.
segment.target: 设置 SIGNATURE TV 的特色功能。

segment.source: Confirm the terms and conditions or change whether to accept the agreement.
segment.target: 确认条款和条件，或更改是否接受协议。

segment.source: Set the additional functions related to the TV.
segment.target: 设置与电视有关的其他功能。

segment.source: Check alarm messages about the user settings or TV status.
segment.target: 查看有关用户设置或电视状态的警报消息。

segment.source: Connect the LAN cable directly to the TV to use the network.
segment.target: 将 LAN 电缆直接连接到电视以使用网络。

segment.source: Take advantage of features that require networking such as the Internet, apps, software updates and etc.
segment.target: 使用需要联网的功能，如互联网、应用、软件更新等。

segment.source: Connect to the network if a wireless router is installed.
segment.target: 如果安装了无线路由器，请连接到网络。

segment.source: Connect TV to external devices with Wi-Fi Direct without wireless router.
segment.target: 使用 Wi-Fi Direct，无需无线路由器即可将电视连接到外部设备。

segment.source: Enjoy content from the connected devices using the Photo & Video and the Music app in TV.
segment.target: 使用电视中的“照片和视频”以及“音乐”应用，欣赏已连接设备上的内容。

segment.source: * Connect to the only device that supports Wi-Fi Direct.
segment.target: * 连接到支持 Wi-Fi Direct 的唯一设备。

segment.source: Connect to the network using the 3G/4G network USB.
segment.target: 使用 3G/4G 网络 USB 连接到网络。

segment.source: Connect external devices like Set-top box, Sound bar and etc to the TV based on guide.
segment.target: 根据指南将机顶盒、条形音响等外部设备连接到电视。

segment.source: If Universal Control of Set-top box/OTT has been set up, take advantage of using Set-top box connected from LG remote control.
segment.target: 如果已设置机顶盒/OTT 的万能遥控，则利用从 LG 遥控器连接的机顶盒。

segment.source: Turn on TV with mobile device same as smartphone.
segment.target: 使用与智能手机相同的移动设备打开电视。

segment.source: Delete the device connection history of Screen Share.
segment.target: 删除多屏互动的设备连接历史记录。

segment.source: Link the information about devices connected to HDMI ports to the TV and set the related settings.
segment.target: 将连接到 HDMI 端口的设备的信息关联到电视并调整相关设置。

segment.source: Register the TV to LG account to control the TV with the voice recognition of external device(AI speaker and etc).
segment.target: 在 LG 账户中注册电视，通过外部设备（AI 扬声器等）的语音识别来控制电视。

segment.source: Set and edit the IP address version to IPv4 or IPv6.
segment.target: 设置 IP 地址版本并将其编辑为 IPv4 或 IPv6。

segment.source: For a WPS(Wi-Fi Protected Setup)-enabled wireless router, press the WPS-PBC button to connect TV to the wireless network.
segment.target: 对于启用了 WPS（Wi-Fi 保护设置）的无线路由器，请按 WPS-PBC 按钮将电视连接到无线网络。

segment.source: For a WPS(Wi-Fi Protected Setup)-enabled wireless router, Enter PIN code to connect TV to the wireless network.
segment.target: 对于启用了 WPS（Wi-Fi 保护设置）的无线路由器，请输入 PIN 码将电视连接到无线网络。

segment.source: Connect to the network by manually entering the IP and DNS server addresses.
segment.target: 通过手动输入 IP 和 DNS 服务器地址连接到网络。

segment.source: Turn on the TV using your mobile device via Wi-Fi.
segment.target: 通过 Wi-Fi 使用移动设备打开电视。

segment.source: * You can control the app which supports the function on your mobile device.
segment.target: * 您可以控制移动设备上支持此功能的应用。

segment.source: Turn on the TV using mobile device via Bluetooth.
segment.target: 通过 Bluetooth 使用移动设备打开电视。

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} 和 HDMI {port2} 端口支持即时游戏响应，您可以打开或关闭此功能。

segment.source: View the original screen as it is or set the screen size and aspect ratio.
segment.target: 按原样查看原始屏幕或设置屏幕大小和画面比例。

segment.source: Display the optimal resolution for the content by an algorithm learned via a deep learning technique.
segment.target: 使用基于深度学习的算法显示内容的最佳分辨率。

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} port supports the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} 端口支持即时游戏响应，您可以打开或关闭此功能。

segment.source: The HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, and HDMI {port3} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}、HDMI {port2} 和 HDMI {port3} 端口支持即时游戏响应，您可以打开或关闭此功能。

segment.source: The HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3}, and HDMI {port4} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}、HDMI {port2}、HDMI {port3} 和 HDMI {port4} 端口支持即时游戏响应，您可以打开或关闭此功能。

segment.source: View the original screen as it is received from broadcasts signal or connected device.
segment.target: 查看从广播信号或连接的设备接收的原始屏幕。

segment.source: Do not unplug the power during this function is running.
segment.target: 此功能运行期间，请勿拔掉电源。

segment.source: Select picture mode for clear picture, cinema, game, etc and adjust the contrast, color, etc of the mode in detail.
segment.target: 为清晰的图片、电影、游戏等选择画面模式，并详细调整模式的对比度、颜色等。

segment.source: Adjust Backlight brightness to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: 调整背光亮度以调亮或调暗屏幕。

segment.source: Adjust the tint to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: 调整色调以调亮或调暗屏幕。

segment.source: Adjust the OLED LIGHT to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: 调整 OLED 光以调亮或调暗屏幕。

segment.source: Adjust the screen color to be pale or deep.
The closer to 100, the clearer the color becomes.
segment.target: 值越接近 100，颜色就越突出。

segment.source: Adjust the balance of red and green to display the tint on the screen.
segment.target: 调整红色和绿色的平衡以显示屏幕色调。

segment.source: The closer to 50 the clearer the red, the closer to 50 the clearer the green.
segment.target: 值越接近 50，红色越突出；值越接近 50，绿色越突出。

segment.source: Adjust the contrast, resolution, etc for individual picture mode in detail and set preferred color, gamma, etc additionally.
segment.target: 详细调整个人画面模式的对比度、分辨率等，并另外设置首选颜色、伽马等。

segment.source: Adjust the color balance by change color temperature, luminance, and red, green, blue intensity.
segment.target: 通过更改色温、亮度和红色、绿色和蓝色强度来调整色彩平衡。

segment.source: Change red intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: 更改红色强度并调整色彩平衡。

segment.source: Change green intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: 更改绿色强度并调整色彩平衡。

segment.source: Change blue intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: 更改蓝色强度并调整色彩平衡。

segment.source: Save the white balance settings from the current picture mode in all inputs.
segment.target: 在所有输入中保存当前画面模式的白平衡设置。

segment.source: Set necessary additional functions based on watching environment and screen status.
segment.target: 根据观看环境和屏幕状态设置必要的附加功能。

segment.source: Reduce irregular noise from digital video signals to optimize image quality clearly.
segment.target: 减少数字视频信号中的不规则噪声，以优化图像质量，使其清晰显示。

notes.note: 기존 리얼 시네마 도움말 국문 변경

segment.source: Adjust the frame ratio in the same way with the movie and it provides the feeling of the movie theater.
segment.target: 以电影方式调整帧比率，提供影院般的观影感受。

segment.source: Optimize image quality lightly and vividly for fast-moving images such as sports and action.
segment.target: 轻松而又生动地优化快速动态图像（如运动图像和动作图像）的图像质量。

segment.source: Apply the detailed setting values of current picture mode to all inputs or apps.
segment.target: 将当前画面模式的详细设置值应用于所有输入或应用。

segment.source: Revert picture setting values to default.
segment.target: 将画面设置值恢复为默认值。

segment.source: It is reset to picture mode individually, so select the desired picture mode and reset it.
segment.target: 其被单独重置为画面模式，因此选择所需的画面模式并重置。

segment.source: If the edge of the screen is not clean, please turn this function off.
segment.target: 如果屏幕边缘不清晰，请将此功能设置为“关”。

segment.source: Adjust color temperature automatically to reduce eye strain.
segment.target: 自动调节色温，减少眼睛疲劳。

segment.source: If a device connected to the port, you can view the optimized picture of the game with minimizing delay or interruption of device video.
segment.target: 如果设备连接到端口，您可以查看优化后的游戏画面，最大限度地减少设备视频的延迟或中断。

segment.source: * The device connected should support this service.
segment.target: * 连接的设备应支持此服务。

segment.source: Correct picture pixel and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: 更正画面像素并防止电视长时间打开时可能遇到的画面质量问题。

segment.source: Save the color adjustment settings from the current picture mode in all inputs.

segment.source: By pressing 'Reset', you will delete all the ad-related data LGE has collected from this Smart TV in the past. Pressing 'Reset' may impact the types of ads you see going forward, but it will not stop you from receiving ads.
segment.target: 通过按“重置”，您将删除 LGE 过去从此智能电视收集的所有广告相关数据。按“重置”可能会影响您以后看到的广告类型，但不会阻止您接收广告。

segment.source: Activating this option will stop the collection and tracking of ad-related personal data from this Smart TV. Turning on the toggle may impact the types of ads you see going forward, but it will not stop you from receiving ads.
segment.target: 激活此选项将停止从此智能电视收集和跟踪广告相关个人数据。打开切换按钮可能会影响您以后看到的广告类型，但不会阻止您接收广告。

segment.source: Activating this toggle will cause LGE to instruct its third party providers to cease commercializing your personal information. Unless you separately opt out, you can still access services like Live Plus, LG Channels, and Get Now.
segment.target: 激活此切换按钮将导致 LGE 指示其第三方提供商停止使您的个人信息商业化。除非您分别选择退出，否则您仍然可以访问 Live Plus、LG Channels 和 Get Now 等服务。

segment.source: By turning Live Plus on, you understand that the content displayed on your TV can be recognized, and the viewing information may be used to provide you with an enhanced viewing experience and personalized services including content recommendations and advertisements. Please review the Privacy Policy and relevant User Agreements in the TV Settings menu for more information.
segment.target: 打开 Live Plus，即表示您理解电视上显示的内容是可以识别的，并且观看信息可以用来为您提供增强的观看体验和个性化服务，包括内容推荐和广告。请查看电视设置菜单中的隐私权政策和相关的用户协议，以获取更多信息。

segment.source: Adjust the audio timing manually to synchronize the screen and audio.

segment.target: 选择要将电视数字声音传输到外部设备的格式。

segment.source: If you select 'Pass Through', you can maintain the original sound quality, but the sound will not be heard on devices that do not support this option.
segment.target: 如果选择“通过”，则可以保持原始音质，但在不支持此选项的设备上听不到声音。

segment.target: 如果选择“通过”后没有声音，则从菜单（如“自动”或“PCM”）中选择另一个输出。即使有声音，也不会应用各种声音效果。

segment.source: Enhance the reception frequency when the HDMI(ARC) audio device supports eARC.

segment.source: This will give you a richer and more vivid sound.

segment.source: Play various sound modes applied to the TV speaker on the sound bar connected to the HDMI(ARC).
segment.target: 在连接到 HDMI(ARC) 的条形音箱上，播放适用于电视扬声器的各种声音模式。

segment.source: 1. If your TV is turned on while Pixel Cleaning is in progress, it will stop the process and you have to start over.

segment.source: 2. While processing, a white line may appear in the screen. This is normal when clearing your screen.
segment.target: 2. 处理时，屏幕上可能会出现白线。这是清理屏幕时会出现的正常现象。

segment.source: Your TV will be updated with the latest software if Internet is connected.

segment.target: 您也可以通过 USB 等外部存储设备来更新电视。

segment.source: Set various features to keep the OLED panel to be in its best condition.

segment.source: Prevent the screen from occurring problem while watching the same channel for a long period of time.
segment.target: 长时间观看同一频道时，防止屏幕出现问题。

segment.source: The screen moves little by little at regular intervals.
segment.target: 屏幕以固定的间隔一点一点地移动。

segment.source: Prevent the screen from occurring problem when the TV is on for a long period of time.
segment.target: 长时间打开电视时，防止屏幕出现问题。

segment.source: Adjust the brightness of static images such as logos and subtitles automatically.
segment.target: 自动调整徽标和字幕等静态图像的亮度。

segment.source: Adjusts the brightness of the screen or set it to turn off automatically to reduce power consumption.
segment.target: 调整屏幕亮度，或将其设置为自动关闭以减少能耗。

segment.source: Brightness of your TV will be affected if you use Energy Saving function.
segment.target: 如果使用节能功能，则电视的亮度会受到影响。

segment.source: The TV will be turned off automatically if the user does not operate the TV or remote control for a certain period of time.
segment.target: 如果用户在一段时间内未操作电视或遥控器，则电视将自动关闭。

segment.source: This feature will choose the most appropriate picture quality according to the color or brightness of the lighting in the room where the TV is placed.
segment.target: 此功能将根据放置了电视的房间中照明的颜色或亮度，选择最合适的画质。

segment.source: Using this function may change the brightness of the screen.

segment.source: Check if the TV is working properly.
segment.target: 检查电视是否正常工作。

segment.source: If there is a problem, the user can change the settings or request a remote diagnosis to fix it.
segment.target: 如果有问题，用户可以更改设置或请求远程诊断来解决问题。

segment.source: Checks if the TV screen is working properly.
segment.target: 检查电视屏幕是否正常工作。

segment.target: 查看条款和条件以及法律信息。

segment.target: 您可以确认条款和条件，或更改是否接受条款和条件。

segment.source: Sending a report on problems that occurred while using LG TV will help improve LG TV.
segment.target: 发送 LG 电视使用问题报告，这将有助于改进 LG 电视。

segment.source: The report includes product information, Mac address, network information, device information connected to the TV, TV power on/off history, memory usage and error information, which will be collected to use only for LG TV errors and usability improvement purposes and will be discarded within 30 days.
segment.target: 该报告包括产品信息、Mac 地址、网络信息、连接到电视的设备信息、电视开机/关机历史记录、内存使用情况和错误信息，这些信息的收集仅用于 LG 电视错误和可用性改进目的，并将在 30 天内废止。

segment.source: For details, please refer to the privacy policy in the 'User Agreements' menu in the TV settings.

segment.target: 通过分析观看模式，推荐适合眼睛疲劳或观看环境的“画面设置”。

segment.source: You can select Voice Recognition Service to use its feature and may adjust settings for related its services.
segment.target: 您可以选择语音识别服务以使用其功能，还可以调整其相关服务的设置。

segment.target: 即使是在没有使用电视的情况下，它也会在环境模式下提供多项日常服务。

segment.target: 为了营造一个安全健康的电视观看环境，可以使用下列功能：使用限制设置、护眼模式、音量限制模式和屏幕时间报告。

segment.target: 当节能模式设置为自动时，您可以手动调节屏幕的黑暗程度。

segment.source: You can temporarily turn off the screen while keeping the TV turned on.
segment.target: 您可以在电视打开的时候，暂时关闭屏幕。

segment.target: 如果打开此功能，将删除所有的蓝牙连接历史。

segment.source: AI learned via LG Deep Learning technique provides the optimal sound and Virtual 7.1.2 surround according to the genre of viewing content.

segment.source: You can make detailed settings for power off.
segment.target: 您可以对关机进行详细设置。

segment.source: If motion is not detected for a certain period of time while Line View is in use, the screen turns off.
segment.target: 如果在使用“线视图”时的一段时间内未检测到请求，屏幕将关闭。

segment.target: 您可以打开或关闭“视图转换声音”。

segment.source: Check '{MenuName}' to turn off the TV directly without display of wallpaper by pressing the 'Power' button.
segment.target: 选中“{MenuName}”可通过按“电源”按钮直接关闭电视而不显示壁纸。

segment.source: Microphone access will be customized for individual apps.
segment.target: 麦克风访问权限将针对各个应用进行自定义。

segment.source: Do you want to continue using this feature?
segment.target: 是否要继续使用此功能？

segment.source: To have a safe and healthy TV viewing environment, the following features are available: Usage Limit Setting, Eye Care Mode, Volume Limit Mode, and Screen Time Reports.
segment.target: 为了营造一个安全健康的电视观看环境，可以使用下列功能：使用限制设置、护眼模式、音量限制模式和屏幕时间报告。

segment.source: Audio Guidance is currently turned on to assist the visually impaired.
segment.target: 目前已开启“音频指南”以帮助视障用户。

segment.source: Turn off the standby screen after the set time.
segment.target: 在设定的时间后关闭待机屏幕。

segment.source: The screen will be turned on when motion is detected in front of the TV.
segment.target: 当检测到电视前方有动作时，屏幕将打开。

segment.source: If you use a remote control other than the Magic Remote, wallpaper may not be supported.
segment.target: 如果您使用动感遥控器以外的遥控设备，墙纸功能可能不受支持。

segment.source: It reduces ambient and background noises and amplifies voices for clearer sound.
segment.target: 这减少了环境和背景噪音，并放大语音以获得更清晰的声音。

notes.note: [22MR2_1st]settings_general_582 : Dialog Enhancement 단계 설정 슬라이드 명칭

segment.source: Provides related information and voice guidance in the event of a disaster.
segment.target: 在发生灾难时提供相关信息和语音指导。

segment.source: Voice guidance is output in the set language.
segment.target: 语音指导将以设定的语言输出。

segment.source: Interactive Service will be activated automatically as per the broadcast signal of the Live TV.
segment.target: 交互式服务将根据直播电视的广播信号自动激活。

segment.source: Interactive Service will be activated automatically as per the broadcast signal connected to HDMI.
segment.target: 交互式服务将根据已连接到 HDMI 的广播信号自动激活。

segment.source: Interactive Service ID is used for the collection of your television's anonymized viewing data for the purpose of providing you with a better television experience.
segment.target: 交互式服务 ID 用于收集电视的匿名观看数据，以便为您提供更好的电视体验。

segment.source: You can reset the Interactive Service ID to establish a new history of anonymized viewing data.
segment.target: 您可以重置交互式服务 ID，以建立匿名观看数据的新历史记录。

segment.source: Adjust the darkness level of the screen when the screen seems brighter than the surroundings.
segment.target: 当屏幕看起来比周围环境更亮时，调整屏幕的暗度。

segment.source: Dolby Vision technology, which analyzes content information to improve clarity and contrast, expresses natural landscapes such as clouds, rocks, sand, water, and snow in detail.
segment.target: 杜比视界技术，用于分析内容信息以提高清晰度和对比度，同时用细节刻画云、岩石、沙子、水和雪等自然景观。

segment.source: It reduces ambient and background noises and enhances voices for clearer sound.
segment.target: 这减少了环境和背景噪音，并增强语音以获得更清晰的声音。

segment.source: Please agree to the terms and conditions to use {menu name}.
segment.target: 请同意服务条款和条件以使用 {menu name}。

segment.source: This feature is available only when it is connected to a PC.
segment.target: 此功能仅在连接到 PC 时可用。

segment.source: This feature will only be available when Energy Saving Mode is set to auto.
segment.target: 此功能仅在节能模式设置为自动时可用。

segment.source: When an emergency occurs, it provides relevant information and voice guidance.
segment.target: 发生紧急情况时，它会提供相关信息和语音指导。

notes.note: [2301_1st] M Project (무선AV) / Mprj_settings_37 / 제로 커넥트 박스 커넥션 세팅 메뉴 도움말

segment.source: The stronger the connection between the Zero Connect Box and the TV screen, the clearer the images will be.
segment.target: 无线电视盒和电视屏幕之间的连接越强，画面就越清晰。

segment.source: When this feature turns on, you can operate the remote control but the touch control will be limited.
segment.target: 打开此功能后，您可以操作遥控器，但触控将受到限制。

notes.note: (제로 커넥트 박스를 조정하여 최적의 시청 환경을 만들어 보세요. - Mprj_2)

segment.source: Please adjust Zero Connect Box for an optimal viewing environment.
segment.target: 请调整无线电视盒以获得最佳观看环境。

notes.note: (제로 커넥트 박스를 추가 조정하면 더 깨끗한 화면으로 시청 가능합니다. - Mprj_12)

segment.source: If you adjust the Zero Connect Box a little more, you can watch a clearer screen.
segment.target: 如果进一步调整无线电视盒，可以观看到更清晰的画面。

notes.note: (제로 커넥트 박스의 위치를 옮겨 다시 조정하세요. - Mprj_14)

segment.source: Adjust Zero Connect Box location again.
segment.target: 再次调整无线电视盒的位置。

notes.note: (1. 제로 커넥트 박스 전면이 사용자를 향하도록 하세요. - Mprj_15)

segment.source: 1. Position the front of the Zero Connect Box toward the user.
segment.target: 1. 将无线电视盒的正面朝向用户。

notes.note: (3. 슬라이딩 버튼이 TV 화면을 향하도록 화살표 위쪽으로 조정하여 제로 커넥트 박스 상단의 신호 세기를 확인하세요. - Mprj_17)

segment.source: 3. Check the signal strength on the top of the Zero Connect Box by moving the sliding button upward so that it faces the TV screen.
segment.target: 3. 向上移动滑动按钮，使其面向电视屏幕，然后检查无线电视盒顶部的信号强度。

notes.note: (- 제로 커넥트 박스와 TV 화면 사이의 장애물을 제거하세요. - Mprj_19)

segment.source: - Make sure to remove any obstacles between the Zero Connect Box and the TV screen.
segment.target: - 确保清除无线电视盒和电视屏幕之间的任何障碍物。

notes.note: (- 선반이 있을 경우, 상단에 놓는 것을 권장합니다. - Mprj_20)

segment.source: - If there is a shelf, it is recommended to place it on the top of the shelf.
segment.target: - 如果有架子，建议将其放在架子的顶部。

notes.note: (- TV 화면과의 거리는 하단 약 {%1}m, 정면 약 {%2}m, 측/후면 약 {%3}m 이내를 권장합니다. - Mprj_21)

segment.source: - It is recommended to place the Zero Connect Box within {%1} m from the bottom, {%2} m from the front, and {%3} m from the side/back of the TV screen.
segment.target: - 建议将无线电视盒放置在距电视屏幕底部 {%1} 米、距正面 {%2} 米、距侧面/背面 {%3} 米的范围内。

notes.note: (- 거리가 멀어지거나, 안테나가 기울수록 화질이 떨어질 수 있습니다. - Mprj_22)

segment.source: - Picture quality may be lower as the distance from the TV screen and the angle of the antenna increase.
segment.target: - 随着到电视屏幕的距离和天线角度的增加,画面质量可能会降低。

notes.note: (1. 제로 커넥트 박스 전면이 최대한 ‘TV 화면 수신부’을 향하도록 하세요. - Mprj_23)

segment.source: 1. Point the front of the Zero Connect Box toward the TV screen as much as possible.
segment.target: 1. 将无线电视盒的正面尽可能指向电视屏幕。

notes.note: (2. 다이얼을 좌/우로 돌려 슬라이딩 버튼의 방향이 ‘TV 화면 수신부’를 향하게 조정하세요. - Mprj_24)

segment.source: 2. Adjust the dial left or right so that the sliding button faces the 'TV screen'.
segment.target: 2. 向左或向右调整拨盘，使滑动按钮面向“电视屏幕”。

notes.note: (3. 슬라이딩 버튼을 상/하로 조정하며 제로 커넥트 박스 상단 LED 및 TV 화면의 신호 색상을 ‘파란색’이 되도록 하세요. - Mprj_25)

segment.source: 3. Move the sliding button upward or downward so that you can check the signal strength on the top of the Zero Connect Box.
segment.target: 3. 向上或向下移动滑动按钮，以便检查无线电视盒顶部的信号强度。

segment.source: Provides the optimal sound according to the genre of viewing contents.
segment.target: 根据观看内容的类型提供最佳音质。

segment.source: * Game Optimizer is not available while using 'Multi View > Dual PC Monitor'.
segment.target: * 在使用“多视图”>“双 PC 显示器”时，游戏优化器不可用。

segment.source: Various features such as Memory Optimizer, Picture and Sound Self-diagnosis are provided to optimize TV status.
segment.target: 提供了内存优化器、画面和声音自我诊断等各种功能，用于优化电视状态。

segment.source: Change the color of the menu on the video and screen to black and white tone for higher clarity.
segment.target: 将视频和屏幕上的菜单颜色更改为黑白色调以获得更高的清晰度。

segment.source: The TV is not connected to a wireless network.
segment.target: 电视未连接到无线网络。

segment.source: Connect your TV and {LG WOWCAST} device to the same wireless network and try again.
segment.target: 将电视和 {LG WOWCAST} 设备连接到同一无线网络，然后重试。
转到 Wi-Fi 连接设置
{LG WOWCAST} 设备+ 电视扬声器

segment.source: The TV is connected to the {LG WOWCAST} device.
segment.target: 电视已连接到 {LG WOWCAST} 设备。

segment.source: If you connect an audio device that supports {LG WOWCAST}, you can play high-quality sound wirelessly over Wi-Fi.
segment.target: 如果连接支持 {LG WOWCAST} 的音频设备，则可以通过 Wi-Fi 无线播放高质量声音。

segment.source: Connect TV speakers and audio devices that support {LG WOWCAST} to hear the TV sound at the same time.
segment.target: 同时连接电视扬声器和支持 {LG WOWCAST} 的音频设备，可以收听电视声音。

segment.source: If you output the sound with TV speaker at the same time, you can hear a richer sound.
segment.target: 如果同时使用电视扬声器输出声音，则可以听到更丰富的音效。

segment.source: Do you want to change the sound out settings?
segment.target: 是否要更改声音输出设置？

segment.source: Do you want to change the sound out settings and sound mode?
segment.target: 是否要更改声音输出设置和声音模式？

segment.source: * If you turn on Automatic Updates, your device will automatically update to the latest version without any notice about update information (version, size, etc.).
segment.target: * 如果开启“自动更新”，设备将自动更新到最新版本，而不会通知更新信息（版本、大小等）。

notes.note: (- TV 화면과의 거리는 하단 약 {%1}m, 정면 약 {%2}m, 측/후면 약 {%3}m 이내를 권장합니다. - Mprj_21)

segment.source: - It is recommended to place the Zero Connect Box within {%1} m from the bottom, {%2} m from the front, and {%3} m from the side of the TV screen.
segment.target: - 建议将无线电视盒放置在距电视屏幕底部 {%1} 米、距正面 {%2} 米、距侧面 {%3} 米的范围内。

segment.source: 2. Adjust the dial left or right so that the sliding button faces the LED on the front of the Zero Connect Box.
segment.target: 2. 向左或向右调整拨盘，使滑动按钮面向无线电视盒正面的 LED 灯。

segment.source: When you turn on automatic captions, the captions are automatically moved to a place that doesn't distract the viewer by detecting the screen.
segment.target: 打开自动字幕时，字幕会自动移动到不会通过检测屏幕分散观看者注意力的位置。

segment.source: Try connecting your TV and {LG WOWCAST} devices to the same Wi-Fi Network(2.4GHz, 5GHz) and try again.
segment.target: 尝试将电视和 {LG WOWCAST} 设备连接到同一 Wi-Fi 网络（2.4 GHz、5 GHz），然后重试。

segment.source: Try connecting a 2.4GHz or 5GHz Wi-Fi Network to connect {LG WOWCAST} devices.
segment.target: 尝试连接 2.4 GHz 或 5 GHz Wi-Fi 网络以连接 {LG WOWCAST} 设备。

segment.source: The {LG WOWCAST} dongle is connected with HDMI(ARC).
segment.target: {LG WOWCAST} 加密狗与 HDMI(ARC) 连接。

segment.source: Please disconnect the dongle and try again to connect your {LG WOWCAST} device wirelessly.
segment.target: 请断开加密狗，然后再次尝试无线连接 {LG WOWCAST} 设备。

segment.source: * This function is not available when you are using DFS channels on your wireless router.
segment.target: * 通过无线路由器使用 DFS 频道时，此功能不可用。
按照广播公司设置进行设置

segment.source: Select the location of the Zero Connect Box.
segment.target: 选择无线电视盒的位置。

segment.source: Find the installation guide by location and check the real-time signal strength.
segment.target: 按位置查找安装指南并检查实时信号强度。

segment.source: Adjust the dial or sliding button again or change the location of the Box.
segment.target: 再次调整拨盘或滑动按钮，或者更改电视盒的位置。

segment.source: Move anything that blocks the path between the Zero Connect Box and the TV screen.
segment.target: 移走任何阻挡无线电视盒和电视屏幕之间的路径的物品。

segment.source: 3. Adjust the sliding button away from the LED on the top of the Zero Connect Box and check the signal strength.
segment.target: 3.调整滑动按钮，使其远离无线电视盒顶部的 LED 指示灯，并检查信号强度。

segment.source: If you install the Zero Connect Box inside the cabinet, the screen and voice recognition function may not work properly depending on the material of the cabinet (marble, wood, etc.) and its thickness.
segment.target: 如果在机柜内安装无线电视盒，则根据机柜的材质（大理石、木材等）及其厚度，屏幕和语音识别功能可能无法正常工作。

segment.source: When you press the button on the remote control, it will provide relevant information.
segment.target: 按遥控器上的按钮时，它将提供相关信息。

segment.source: 3. Make sure the LED on the top of the Box and the signal strength of the TV screen turn 'blue' by adjusting the sliding button upward or downward.
segment.target: 3.通过向上或向下调节滑动按钮，确保电视盒顶部的 LED 和电视屏幕的信号强度变为“蓝色”。

segment.source: 3. Adjust the sliding button away from the LED on the top of the Box, and make sure the LED on the top of the Box and the signal strength of the TV screen turn 'blue'.
segment.target: 3.调节滑动按钮，使其远离电视盒顶部的 LED，并确保电视盒顶部的 LED 和电视屏幕的信号强度变为“蓝色”。

segment.source: - Do not install the Zero Connect Box higher than the TV screen.
segment.target: - 请勿将无线电视盒安装在高于电视屏幕的位置。

segment.source: The direction of the wireless signal strength is not facing the TV.
segment.target: 无线信号强度的方向不面向电视。

segment.source: * This is the case when you locate the box in the shaded area at the bottom of the TV screen.
segment.target: * 例如将电视盒放置在电视屏幕底部的阴影区域。

segment.source: When installing the box next to the shaded area, reset the location of the box to the side and install it again.
segment.target: 将电视盒安装在阴影区域旁边时，请将电视盒的位置重新安置到侧面并重新安装。

segment.source: - If you install the Zero Connect Box inside the cabinet, the screen and voice recognition function may not work properly depending on the material of the cabinet (marble, wood, etc.) and its thickness.
segment.target: - 如果在机柜内安装无线电视盒，则根据机柜的材质（大理石、木材等）及其厚度，屏幕和语音识别功能可能无法正常工作。

segment.source: You can set to show or hide advertisements that appear on the screen saver from some apps such as {LG Channels}, {Apps}.
segment.target: 您可以设置显示或隐藏某些应用（如 {LG Channels}、{Apps}）的屏幕保护程序上出现的广告。

segment.source: * Professional settings allow you to fine-tune the expression of a variety of mastering contents.
segment.target: * 专业设置允许您微调各种母版内容的表达。

segment.target: 删除观看信息可能会影响根据观看或设备使用信息提供的推荐服务。

segment.source: This feature describes menu names or device statuses via audio.
segment.target: 此功能通过音频描述菜单名称或设备状态。

segment.source: Describes the content of broadcast programs that support audio description.
segment.target: 描述支持音频描述的广播节目的内容。

You can see blurry images clearer and sharper when there are colors.

segment.target: 设置为“自动”时，字幕将自动切换到不会干扰您观看的位置。
